alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 28 at 3:43PM AKST until November 29 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 60 to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Skagway, Klondike Highway, and Downtown Juneau and Douglas. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very strong winds will develop early Tuesday morning as Arctic high pressure strengthens over the Yukon and British Columbia, and a low pressure system moves south over the eastern Gulf of Alaska. Areas where the highest winds will occur include Skagway and Downtown Juneau. Winds diminish Tuesday night as the low in the south of the AK Gulf weakens. Wind chills to 40 below near Skagway and White Pass.
info.instruction: A high wind warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Use caution if you must travel. Protect exposed skin and limit exposure to very cold temperatures on the Klondike Highway.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; Municipality of Skagway
